title: Notify requester of IT Solver away on holiday

value:
Your request (#{{ticket.id}}) has been received. IT Solver is closed as Angus is on holiday. Upon returning approximately August 9-16, Angus will review this request. If this request has a critical impact on your business, consider alternative channels for support. This include the manufacturer or service provider, authorised repair centres and other trusted technicians. Thank you for your patience.

To add additional comments, reply to this email or click the link below:
{{ticket.url_with_protocol}}

{{ticket.comments_formatted}}

raw_title: Notify requester of IT Solver away on holiday
